criterion: Provides information on the causes of ear issues, including wax buildup, allergies, and infections.
Mentions the possibility of viral infections, which cannot be treated with antibiotics.
Does not recommend over-the-counter medication for ear infections without consulting a healthcare professional.
Provides a general overview of ear infections, including symptoms and treatment options.
Does not suggest self-diagnosis or self-treatment for ear infections.
Mentions the importance of consulting a healthcare professional for personalized recommendations.
Does not provide misinformation about antibiotic use for ear infections.
Provides a clear and concise description of ear infections and their symptoms.
Does not recommend ear infection meds without examining the ear first.
Mentions the possibility of fluid in the middle ear, which can cause ear infections.
Does not provide overly complicated medical information.
Provides information on when to seek professional advice for ear issues.
